name: CARGAME
description:
CARGAME is new type of racing game where you can just drive around of cities and race tracks. You can choose what track or city u want a drive and go drive like a furious head.
CARGAME controls from most realistic car driving simulators.

Features:

  • Cool sound track
  • +10 Unique tracks
  • Drifting
  • Realistic car controls
  • Real car sounds

Controls:

  • WASD=Movement
  • ESCAPE=MainMenu
  • E=Start Engine
  • Space=HANDBRAKE
  • Q=Reset
